text: Here are the explanations and examples of the 5-point scaling, please read them carefully before moving forward.

choices:
• Sentences in this category have findings which say mostly different information

  • The sentences may be on totally different topics

    1. Overconsumption of sugar causes diabetes

    2. Regular exercise improves heart health

  • There may be some overlap in key words used between the two sentences, but the actual information is completely different

    1. Chocolate contains a lot of sugar, and therefore can have an effect on weight.

    2. Overconsumption of sugar leads to diabetes.
